statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 4 \\ -8 \\ 16 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ 9 \\ -19 \\ 38 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ -15 \\ 30 \\ -60 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
